Operation 'get_/account' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. The operation lacks a summary entirely and the description is too vague. It doesn't specify what 'account information' includes, doesn't mention authentication requirements, and doesn't clarify the response structure. For AI agents, it's unclear what data will be returned or when this operation should be used. The improved version specifies the authentication requirement, indicates the types of information returned (subscription status, usage limits, job quotas), and references the accountResponse schema for clarity.

data.current_description: Retrieve account information
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the authenticated user's account information including subscription status, usage limits, and job quotas. Requires API token authentication. Returns an accountResponse object containing account details such as fast hours remaining, job slots, and subscription tier information.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely and the description is too vague. It doesn't specify what 'account information' includes, doesn't mention authentication requirements, and doesn't clarify the response structure. For AI agents, it's unclear what data will be returned or when this operation should be used. The improved version specifies the authentication requirement, indicates the types of information returned (subscription status, usage limits, job quotas), and references the accountResponse schema for clarity.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/imagine' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary entirely and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (generate images), expected inputs (prompt and optional parameters), return value (job object), and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and how to track results.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /imagine command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /imagine command to generate images from a text prompt. Accepts a prompt string and optional parameters (aspect ratio, quality, style, etc.). Returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary entirely and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (generate images), expected inputs (prompt and optional parameters), return value (job object), and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and how to track results.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/button' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original description is confusing and lacks structure. Clarified that this operation applies actions to existing images (not standalone), specified required inputs (job ID and action identifier), explained the return value, and added context about asynchronous processing for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Midjourney upscale or create variations and enhance or modify buttons
data.summary_suggestion: Apply upscale or variation actions to images
data.description_suggestion: Applies Midjourney button actions to previously generated images, including upscaling, creating variations, or enhancing/modifying results. Requires a job ID from a prior /imagine, /blend, or /describe operation and a button action identifier. Returns a new job object with the requested action queued for processing. Results can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description is confusing and lacks structure. Clarified that this operation applies actions to existing images (not standalone), specified required inputs (job ID and action identifier), explained the return value, and added context about asynchronous processing for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/blend' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (blend images), input requirements (2-5 images), optional parameters, return value, and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /blend command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /blend command to combine multiple images into a single cohesive result. Accepts 2-5 image URLs and optional parameters (aspect ratio, quality, etc.). Returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (blend images), input requirements (2-5 images), optional parameters, return value, and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/describe' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and context. Added clarity about the action (generate descriptions from images), input requirements (image URL), return value, and use case (descriptions can be used as prompts) for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /describe command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /describe command to generate text descriptions and prompts from an image. Accepts an image URL and returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and returns multiple text descriptions that can be used as prompts for /imagine operations. Monitor results via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and context. Added clarity about the action (generate descriptions from images), input requirements (image URL), return value, and use case (descriptions can be used as prompts) for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs/**' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks summary and is unclear about required inputs. Added clarity about the required job ID parameter, what status information is returned, and the polling use case for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Retrieve status and results of jobs/imagine, jobs/button, jobs/blend or jobs/describe
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current status and results of a specific job created by /imagine, /button, /blend, or /describe operations. Requires the job ID as a path parameter. Returns a job object containing status (queued, processing, completed, failed), progress information, and final results (image URLs, descriptions, etc.) when available. Use this endpoint to poll for job completion.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and is unclear about required inputs. Added clarity about the required job ID parameter, what status information is returned, and the polling use case for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs/cancel/**' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and clarity about what can be cancelled. Added information about required job ID parameter, return value, state constraints (only queued/processing jobs), and irreversibility for better AI agent understanding of side effects.

data.current_description: Cancel execution of job created by jobs/imagine, jobs/button, jobs/blend or jobs/describe
data.summary_suggestion: Cancel a queued or processing job
data.description_suggestion: Cancels the execution of a job created by /imagine, /button, /blend, or /describe operations. Requires the job ID as a path parameter. Returns a cancellation response confirming the job has been cancelled. Only jobs in queued or processing states can be cancelled; completed or failed jobs cannot be cancelled. This operation has immediate effect and cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and clarity about what can be cancelled. Added information about required job ID parameter, return value, state constraints (only queued/processing jobs), and irreversibility for better AI agent understanding of side effects.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description lacks summary and is vague about return format. Added clarity about return value (array of job objects), what information is included, scope (authenticated user only), and which job states are included for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Get list of currently executing jobs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all currently executing jobs for the authenticated user. Returns an array of job objects containing job IDs, types (imagine, button, blend, describe), current status, and progress information. This endpoint is useful for monitoring multiple concurrent operations. Only jobs in queued or processing states are included; completed or failed jobs are not returned.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and is vague about return format. Added clarity about return value (array of job objects), what information is included, scope (authenticated user only), and which job states are included for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Retrieve account information
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the authenticated user's account information including subscription status, usage limits, and job quotas. Requires API token authentication. Returns an accountResponse object containing account details such as fast hours remaining, job slots, and subscription tier information.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely and the description is too vague. It doesn't specify what 'account information' includes, doesn't mention authentication requirements, and doesn't clarify the response structure. For AI agents, it's unclear what data will be returned or when this operation should be used. message: Operation 'post_/jobs/imagine' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary entirely and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (generate images), expected inputs (prompt and optional parameters), return value (job object), and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and how to track results.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /imagine command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /imagine command to generate images from a text prompt. Accepts a prompt string and optional parameters (aspect ratio, quality, style, etc.). Returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary entirely and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (generate images), expected inputs (prompt and optional parameters), return value (job object), and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and how to track results.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/button' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original description is confusing and lacks structure. Clarified that this operation applies actions to existing images (not standalone), specified required inputs (job ID and action identifier), explained the return value, and added context about asynchronous processing for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Midjourney upscale or create variations and enhance or modify buttons
data.summary_suggestion: Apply upscale or variation actions to images
data.description_suggestion: Applies Midjourney button actions to previously generated images, including upscaling, creating variations, or enhancing/modifying results. Requires a job ID from a prior /imagine, /blend, or /describe operation and a button action identifier. Returns a new job object with the requested action queued for processing. Results can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description is confusing and lacks structure. Clarified that this operation applies actions to existing images (not standalone), specified required inputs (job ID and action identifier), explained the return value, and added context about asynchronous processing for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/blend' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (blend images), input requirements (2-5 images), optional parameters, return value, and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /blend command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /blend command to combine multiple images into a single cohesive result. Accepts 2-5 image URLs and optional parameters (aspect ratio, quality, etc.). Returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and can be monitored via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and provides minimal context. Added clarity about the action (blend images), input requirements (2-5 images), optional parameters, return value, and asynchronous nature for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs/describe' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and context. Added clarity about the action (generate descriptions from images), input requirements (image URL), return value, and use case (descriptions can be used as prompts) for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Submit the Midjourney /describe command
data.description_suggestion: Submits a Midjourney /describe command to generate text descriptions and prompts from an image. Accepts an image URL and returns a job object containing the job ID, status, and initial processing information. The job executes asynchronously and returns multiple text descriptions that can be used as prompts for /imagine operations. Monitor results via the /jobs/{job_id} endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and context. Added clarity about the action (generate descriptions from images), input requirements (image URL), return value, and use case (descriptions can be used as prompts) for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs/**' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks summary and is unclear about required inputs. Added clarity about the required job ID parameter, what status information is returned, and the polling use case for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Retrieve status and results of jobs/imagine, jobs/button, jobs/blend or jobs/describe
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current status and results of a specific job created by /imagine, /button, /blend, or /describe operations. Requires the job ID as a path parameter. Returns a job object containing status (queued, processing, completed, failed), progress information, and final results (image URLs, descriptions, etc.) when available. Use this endpoint to poll for job completion.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and is unclear about required inputs. Added clarity about the required job ID parameter, what status information is returned, and the polling use case for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs/cancel/**' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks summary and clarity about what can be cancelled. Added information about required job ID parameter, return value, state constraints (only queued/processing jobs), and irreversibility for better AI agent understanding of side effects.

data.current_description: Cancel execution of job created by jobs/imagine, jobs/button, jobs/blend or jobs/describe
data.summary_suggestion: Cancel a queued or processing job
data.description_suggestion: Cancels the execution of a job created by /imagine, /button, /blend, or /describe operations. Requires the job ID as a path parameter. Returns a cancellation response confirming the job has been cancelled. Only jobs in queued or processing states can be cancelled; completed or failed jobs cannot be cancelled. This operation has immediate effect and cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and clarity about what can be cancelled. Added information about required job ID parameter, return value, state constraints (only queued/processing jobs), and irreversibility for better AI agent understanding of side effects.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description lacks summary and is vague about return format. Added clarity about return value (array of job objects), what information is included, scope (authenticated user only), and which job states are included for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Get list of currently executing jobs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all currently executing jobs for the authenticated user. Returns an array of job objects containing job IDs, types (imagine, button, blend, describe), current status, and progress information. This endpoint is useful for monitoring multiple concurrent operations. Only jobs in queued or processing states are included; completed or failed jobs are not returned.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks summary and is vague about return format. Added clarity about return value (array of job objects), what information is included, scope (authenticated user only), and which job states are included for better AI agent interpretability.
